title: Opioid Epidemic - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/2/22
itunes:title: Opioid Epidemic - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/2/22
description:
George Noory, Scott Higham and Sari Horwitz discuss the role of Mexican drug cartels have in manufacturing opioid pills laced with fentanyl.  They also touch on the doctors and pharmacies role in overprescribing opioids which fuels the opioid crisis in America.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
